title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Jewish Association on Aging
Interview Descriptions: Interview with HR and DON. Tour of unit and meet some staff members. Able to ask a lot of questions and see future work environment. Nice campus, very large. Only about an hour.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Jewish Association on Aging (Pittsburgh, PA) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: Never had formal interview, I just sent my resume in and was hired, DON was always too busy to talk, taught myself a lot especially on the computer, no real support system, mgmt and admin ARENT on the sam epage
